column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////A month later
column2: the cluster continues....same blonde cashier chick manning 1 of 2 cash registers just chatting away with the chef (I presume) while the other cashier does all the work.  Counter staff was friendly but putting a Chocolate Croissant in a bag seemed challenging.  The people in front of me ordered and paid by the time
